Description: Maximum AI deactivation - Disables all 13 Windows 11 AI features using official Microsoft policies

1_GenerativeAI_Master.Name: Generative AI Master Switch
1_GenerativeAI_Master.Description: Blocks ALL apps from using Windows on-device generative AI models AND app-level generative AI access
1_GenerativeAI_Master.Impact: Disables generative AI in Notepad, Paint, Photos, Clipchamp, Snipping Tool, and all future apps. Also blocks app access to generative AI features.

LetAppsAccessSystemAIModels.Description: Force Deny - No app can access on-device generative AI models (0=User decides, 1=Force Allow, 2=Force Deny)

LetAppsAccessGenerativeAI.Description: Force Deny - Block app access to generative AI features (Text & Image Generation in Settings)

Value.Description: CapabilityAccessManager Workaround - Blocks Paint Generative Erase/Background Removal

2_Windows_Recall.Name: Windows Recall (Complete Deactivation + Enterprise Protection)
2_Windows_Recall.Description: Takes continuous screenshots of EVERYTHING on your screen (passwords, banking, private messages) and stores them locally for AI-powered search. EXTREME privacy risk!
2_Windows_Recall.Impact: Component completely removed from system, all snapshots deleted, background data providers disabled, apps/URLs protected

AllowRecallEnablement.Description: REMOVE Recall component from system + delete all existing snapshots (requires reboot)

DisableAIDataAnalysis.Description: PREVENT saving new snapshots for Recall (Device-scope)
PREVENT saving new snapshots for Recall (User-scope)

DisableRecallDataProviders.Description: DISABLE Recall background data providers (Enterprise/Education only)

SetDenyAppListForRecall.Description: Apps NEVER captured in snapshots (Browser for Banking, Terminal for Passwords, KeePass, RDP)

SetDenyUriListForRecall.Description: Websites/URLs NEVER captured in snapshots (Banking, Email, Login pages)

SetMaximumStorageDurationForRecallSnapsh.Description: Maximum snapshot retention: 30 days (Choices: 30/60/90/180 days, 0=OS default)

SetMaximumStorageSpaceForRecallSnapshots.Description: Maximum snapshot storage: 10 GB (Choices: 10/25/50/75/100/150 GB, 0=OS default)

3_Windows_Copilot.Name: Windows Copilot (System-Wide AI Assistant - 4-Layer Defense)
3_Windows_Copilot.Description: Microsoft's AI assistant integrated into Windows (chat, suggestions, proactive recommendations)
3_Windows_Copilot.Impact: Copilot completely disabled in UI, taskbar, and search. Hardware Copilot key remapped to Notepad.

ShowCopilotButton.Description: HIDE Copilot Layer 3 (Taskbar Button Hidden HKLM)

SetCopilotHardwareKey.Description: REMAP hardware Copilot key to open Notepad instead

4_Click_to_Do.Name: Click to Do (Screenshot AI Analysis)
4_Click_to_Do.Description: Takes on-demand screenshots and analyzes them with AI to suggest actions (copy text, search, call numbers)

DisableClickToDo.Description: DISABLE Click to Do (no screenshot AI analysis, no action suggestions)

5_Paint_Cocreator.Name: Paint Cocreator (Cloud-Based Image Generation)
5_Paint_Cocreator.Description: Text-to-image generation using cloud AI (type description, AI creates artwork)
5_Paint_Cocreator.Impact: Cocreator feature completely removed from Paint app

DisableCocreator.Description: DISABLE Paint Cocreator (no AI-generated images from text prompts)

6_Paint_Generative_Fill.Name: Paint Generative Fill (Cloud-Based AI Editing)
6_Paint_Generative_Fill.Description: AI-powered image editing (fill selected areas with AI-generated content)
6_Paint_Generative_Fill.Impact: Generative Fill feature completely removed from Paint app

DisableGenerativeFill.Description: DISABLE Paint Generative Fill (no AI-powered content-aware fill)

7_Paint_Image_Creator.Name: Paint Image Creator (Cloud-Based AI Art)
7_Paint_Image_Creator.Description: DALL-E powered AI art generator integrated into Paint
7_Paint_Image_Creator.Impact: Image Creator feature completely removed from Paint app

DisableImageCreator.Description: DISABLE Paint Image Creator (no DALL-E AI art generation)

8_Notepad_AI.Name: Notepad AI (Copilot Integration - Write, Summarize, Rewrite)
8_Notepad_AI.Description: GPT-powered AI features in Notepad (generate text, summarize content, rewrite paragraphs)
8_Notepad_AI.Impact: All AI features completely removed from Notepad app
8_Notepad_AI.Note: ADMX file (WindowsNotepad.admx) is NOT required - registry policy works without it. ADMX only provides GUI visibility in gpedit.msc.

DisableAIFeatures.Description: DISABLE all AI features in Notepad (Write, Summarize, Rewrite, Explain) - Microsoft official registry value name

9_Settings_Agent.Name: Settings Agent (AI-Powered Settings Search)
9_Settings_Agent.Description: AI-enhanced natural language search in Windows Settings (understands questions like 'How do I change wallpaper?')
9_Settings_Agent.Impact: AI search disabled, only classic keyword search remains

DisableSettingsAgent.Description: DISABLE Settings AI agent (fallback to classic search without natural language understanding)

10_Recall_Export_Block.Name: Recall Export Prevention (NEW - KB5055627)
10_Recall_Export_Block.Description: Prevents users from exporting Recall snapshots to share with apps/websites (EEA compliance feature)
10_Recall_Export_Block.Impact: Export functionality completely disabled, prevents data exfiltration

11_Copilot_URI_Handlers.Name: Copilot URI Protocol Handlers (Deep Link Block)
11_Copilot_URI_Handlers.Description: Blocks ms-copilot: and ms-edge-copilot: URI handlers that bypass policy restrictions
11_Copilot_URI_Handlers.Impact: Prevents launching Copilot via deep links, Start menu search, or third-party apps
11_Copilot_URI_Handlers.Note: These handlers are in HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT and route Copilot requests to Edge

12_Edge_Copilot_Sidebar.Name: Microsoft Edge Copilot Sidebar (Browser AI)
12_Edge_Copilot_Sidebar.Description: Disables Copilot integration in Edge browser sidebar
12_Edge_Copilot_Sidebar.Impact: Edge sidebar and Copilot features completely disabled

CopilotPageContext.Description: PREVENT Copilot from accessing page content

13_Region_Policy_Override.Name: IntegratedServicesRegionPolicySet.json Override
13_Region_Policy_Override.Description: Modifies Windows regional policy file to disable Copilot globally (bypasses region restrictions)
13_Region_Policy_Override.Impact: Copilot disabled at OS level regardless of region setting
13_Region_Policy_Override.Note: Requires TakeOwnership of system file - changes 'Windows CoPilot' policy to disabled

14_Copilot_Network_Block.Name: Copilot Network Block (Hosts File)
14_Copilot_Network_Block.Description: Blocks Copilot cloud endpoints via hosts file redirect
14_Copilot_Network_Block.Note: Optional aggressive blocking - may affect legitimate Bing searches

15_File_Explorer_AI_Actions.Name: File Explorer AI Actions Menu
15_File_Explorer_AI_Actions.Description: Hides 'AI Actions' entry from File Explorer right-click context menu (image editing, text summarization, etc.)
15_File_Explorer_AI_Actions.Impact: AI Actions menu entry removed from Explorer context menu

HideAIActionsMenu.Description: HIDE AI Actions from File Explorer context menu

AutomaticallyBlockedByMasterSwitch.Description: These AI features are automatically blocked by the Generative AI Master Switch (no dedicated policies exist)

Features.Name: Photos Background Blur/Remove
Features.Description: AI background effects in Photos app

Features.Name: Photos Auto-Categorization
Features.Description: AI-powered photo organization (Receipts, IDs, Screenshots, Notes)

Features.Name: Snipping Tool AI-OCR
Features.Description: Text extraction and actions from screenshots

Features.Name: All Future Generative AI Apps
Features.Description: Any app that uses Windows generative AI models

Summary.TotalAIFeaturesDisabled: 13 features (10 dedicated + 3 advanced blocks + unlimited via master switch)

Summary.OnDeviceAIBlocked: All on-device generative AI models via systemAIModels API
Summary.EdgeAIBlocked: Copilot sidebar, page context, all AI integrations
Summary.EnterpriseCompliance: Maximum (Recall app/URI protection, storage limits, export block)
